# This is another one!

This is the trend of recovered deaths over time.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r read-data, include=FALSE}
covid19 <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/datasets/covid-19/master/data/time-series-19-covid-combined.csv")
```

```{r create-plot2, message = FALSE, warning=FALSE}
covid19 %>%
  filter(`Country/Region` == "Indonesia") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Date,
             y = Recovered)) +
  geom_line()
```
The number of recovered cases also increased in an incresing rate!
